definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The research center is carrying out a thorough study of this metal's superconductivity.
sentences.chinese: 正在對這種金屬的超導電性進行深入研究。

sentences.english: The problem on granular superconductivity is also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 還對顆粒超導電性的問題進行了討論。

sentences.english: The superconductivity in effective repulsive interaction between two electrons is considered.
sentences.chinese: 分析了電子間在有效排斥互作用下的超導電性。

sentences.english: Perfect conductivity is the first traditional hallmark of super- conductivity .
sentences.chinese: 完全導電性是超導電性的第一個傳統的檢驗標誌。

sentences.english: This paper described how to study superconductivity by ac susceptibility(acs) measurements.
sentences.chinese: 本文探討利用交流磁化率研究超導電性。
